And one night, the hidden bubble burst.', '[00:38.560 --> 00:44.320]  The lake suddenly erupted a massive cloud of carbon dioxide.', '[00:44.320 --> 00:50.800]  And because it is heavier than air, it sank down into the villages,', '[00:50.800 --> 00:58.160]  replacing all the oxygen, every human and animal suffocated without a sound', '[00:58.160 --> 01:00.240]  in their sleep.
